result.purpose: Defines data models for various entities used in the discovery module of the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing data models related to different entities within the discovery module, facilitating maintainability and scalability.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/a.purpose: Defines data models for announcements in the discovery module.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/c.purpose: Defines data models for collections in a discovery service using GORM.
Defines data models for contact entities in the discovery module.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/e.purpose: Defines event-related data models for discovery functionality.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/f.purpose: Defines data models for feature banners and their headlines in a discovery module.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/g.purpose: Defines data models for discovery-related entities in a repository.
Defines data models for Mavis sales responses and related metadata.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/h.purpose: Defines data models for home banner widgets and entities in a discovery module.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/l.purpose: Defines data models for layout and widget entities in a discovery service.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/p.purpose: Defines data models for product entities in the discovery module.

internal/repositories/discovery/models/s.purpose: Defines data models for service entities and widget service items in a discovery context.
